sentences.sentence: The letter was written by Darwin to thank an American geologist, Dr. Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden.
sentences.translation: 这封信是达尔文为感谢美国地质学家费迪南德·范德维耶·海登博士而写的。

sentences.sentence: It is the only paved road discovered in ancient Egypt, said geologist Thomas Bown of the United States Geological Survey.
sentences.translation: 美国地质调查局的地质学家托马斯·鲍恩说，这是在古埃及发现的唯一一条铺好的路。

sentences.sentence: Robin Beaman, a marine geologist at James Cook University, says that the reserve does "broadly protect the range of habitats" in the sea.
sentences.translation: 詹姆斯·库克大学的海洋地质学家罗宾·比曼说，该保护区确实“广泛保护了海洋中的栖息地范围”。
